traditional: 束縛
shùfù bind; to restrict; to tie; to commit; fetters
yīcì in order; in succession
pòqiè urgent; pressing
jiànquán robust; strong
fǎlìng decree; ordinance
zìzhì autonomy

traditional: 自動化
zìdònghuà automation

traditional: 突擊
tūjī make a sudden and violent attack; do a crash job
fǎndì anti-imperialist; anti-imperialists

traditional: 大膽
dàdǎn courageous; daring; fearless

traditional: 右邊
yòubiān right (as opposed to left)

traditional: 事項
shìxiàng matter; item

traditional: 各國
gèguó each country; every country; various countries

traditional: 富農
fùnóng kulak
chōuxiàng abstract

traditional: 包裝
bāozhuāng pack; package
wūrǎn pollution
tōngdào (communications) channel; thoroughfare; passage

traditional: 所屬
suǒshǔ one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with); subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself); belonging to; affiliated; under one's command

traditional: 生鐵
shēngtiě pig iron
